payMore.subtitle: An FX Partnership Programme That
payMore.title: Pays More Than Just Commission
payMore.intro: Welcome to a partnership built for performance. At GTC, we don’t just give you up to 80% in Rebates; we give you the tools to grow your business.
payMore.outro: From real trader bonuses to marketing support and instant payouts, this is the Forex partnership programme serious partners are switching to.

feature1.title: Earn Up to 80% in Rebates
feature1.description: No caps, no limits. Just real payouts you can count on.

feature2.title: Tradeable Bonus for Your Traders
feature2.description: Higher deposits, more volume, more commission for you.

feature3.title: Events & Marketing Tools
feature3.description: We’ll help you attract & convert more traders.

feature4.title: Instant Commission Payouts
feature4.description: Withdraw your partner earnings the moment they hit.

broker.heading: A Broker You Can  Actually Trust
broker.paragraph: We’re not a fly-by-night operation. GTC is licensed and regulated in multiple respected jurisdictions. Here’s how we give you confidence to trade.

points.p1: Licensed by the UAE’s SCA, Mauritius' FSC, and South Africa's FSCA.
points.p2: Headquartered in Dubai with nearly 1 million global traders.
points.p3: World-class support with a real human touch.
points.p4: Customer-first culture where service is strategy.

broker.bottomTitle: Switch to a broker that doesn’t just say it, we prove it every day.

testimonials.title: What the Saudi’s FX Partners & Traders Are Saying
testimonials.description: Whether you’re a seasoned partner or just getting started, these partners made the switch and they or their traders haven’t looked back.

t1.text: “As an FX partner, getting up to 80% in Rebates and paid out instantly was a game changer. I moved my entire client book to GTC where they’re looked after.”
t1.name: Judi Izdihar Shamoon, Riyadh

t2.text: “I run monthly trading classes in Saudi Arabia. GTC gave me banners, an LP, and real bonuses for my traders. The support is unreal!”
t2.name: Suoud Butrus Gaber, Jeddah

t3.text: “My trading educator recommended GTC. I was sceptical at first, but now I see why he recommended them. The spreads, bonus, everything just works really well.”
t3.name: Kutaiba Abdul-Matin Awad, Dammam

t4.text: “GTC doesn’t just talk, they deliver! I get paid on time, every time, and my traders are sticking around longer than ever. They also trade gold and GTC is great with them.”
t4.name: Yasser Nu'aym Bazzi, Riyadh

growIB.subtitle: Start Earning More.
growIB.title: Grow Your FX Partner Business with GTC
growIB.description1: You’ve seen what GTC brings to the table. Now it’s your turn. Join the partnership programme that’s helping the Saudi’s FX partners scale faster, earn more, and build lasting trust with their traders.
growIB.description2: Join us today, and your traders will thank you tomorrow.

PartnerBanner.title: Let 2025 be the Year You Trade  with a Real, Award-Winning Leader.
PartnerBanner.paragraph: We’ve got unbeatable spreads, super-fast deposits, and a team that actually wants your success. Whether you’re looking to get started as a trader or you're looking to grow your investment portfolio, let’s talk. No hard pitch, just real conversations that could lead to real results.
PartnerBanner.subheading: Go ahead and book a meeting with me. Click on the Book a Meeting button below.

PartnerSectionTwo.title: Good Brokers are Hard to Find.  Great Brokers - Like GTC - Are Gold Dust!
PartnerSectionTwo.paragraph: I get it. I really do. Finding a reliable brokerage isn’t easy. We're trusted by a million traders worldwide because we show up, stay consistent, and actually care about your investment growth.
PartnerSectionTwo.subheading: Let’s build something real, no drama, no excuses, just results.

GoodPartner.title: Calling All Introducing Brokers:Still Stuck in the Same Old Deal?
GoodPartner.paragraph: If your current offer feels just "Okay," it’s time for a change. Simply show us the deal you're on and we'll beat it. No pressure. No fluff. No Games. We’ll walk you through how we can do better, how we can give you a lot more value, more support, and more reasons to switch to GTC. This isn’t a sales pitch. It’s a chance to grow smarter.

card1.title: Up To 80% in Rebates!
card1.desc: You read that right! We're offering our partners up to a massive 80% in rebates. You won't find this deal anywhere else.

card2.title: Small changes. Big Wins
card2.desc: When you start your switch to GTC, you'll see just how easy it is. We take care of all your needs, no matter what.

card3.title: Your Goals.  Our Plan
card3.desc: We don’t do one-size-fits-all. We build around you, what you need, what you value, and where you’re headed.

TalkTrendsSection.title: We'll Talk Trends,{br}Not Just Tactics.
TalkTrendsSection.paragraph: Everyone’s chasing the next big thing—AI tools, faster flows, smarter funnels. But not everyone’s talking about what’s actually working. I'm more than happy to share what we’re seeing across the industry, what’s changing, and where the smart money’s going.
